item.description: Please com join Japanese Association of MIT's (JAM) fun annual event. While you're enjoying sushi, hot noodles, and cotton candies, you will see pounding rice demonstration, paper sumo wrestling and more! This event is open to the general public, admission is free, but offerings are given in exchange for tickets. Tickets are $1 each, food, drink and other activities will range between 1 and 5 tickets. Seats are limited, so come early! Ashdown House (Hulsizer Room) Directions: http://ashdown.mit.edu/directions.php Map: http://maps.google.com/?q=235+albany+st+cambridge+ma+02139+usa
item.name: Japanese Tsukimi Party at MIT
